entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
